title: Chicken with cherry tomato risotto
ingredients: ['200g cherry tomatoes', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 chicken breasts, with skin', 'salt to taste', '600ml chicken stock', '200g arborio rice', '1 large handful basil leaves, finely chopped', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '30g grated Parmesan cheese', 'lemon juice']
